attributes.action: DO NOT ALLOW the BBC to cut programming to save money while it maintains lavish salary and expenses allowances for its staff.
attributes.additional_details: Precisely like politicians at all levels, when cuts to spending are necessary, the BBC never looks first at where HUGE savings could be made by bringing their salary, severance payments, allowances and expenses down to earthly levels FIRST.

rejection.details: The day-to-day operations are a matter for the BBC, and the BBC Trust.
